data.comment: Leigh Doughty starts the match. Reading with the kick-off in London.
At The Den, Jake Cooper has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 30, Reading's Alfa Semedo has been booked in London.
Leigh Doughty blows to end the first-half.
Goal! Jed Wallace gives Millwall a 1-0 lead in London.
In the minute 46, It's Millwall with the kick-off after the break.
Reading make their first substitution with Michael Olise replacing Alfa Semedo.
Shaun Williams for Millwall has been booked by Leigh Doughty and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 53, Lucas Joao gets an equalizer for Reading. The score is now 1-1.
Michael Morrison (Reading) gets a yellow card.
Ovie Ejaria (Reading) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 63, The home team replace Troy Parrott with Jon Dadi BÃ¶dvarsson.
Shaun Hutchinson (Millwall) has received a yellow card from Leigh Doughty.
The home team have replaced Scott Malone with Matt Smith. This is the second substitution made today by Gary Rowett.
In the minute 75, Shane Ferguson is replacing Ben Thompson for Millwall at The Den.
Tom Holmes (Reading) has received a first yellow card.
Ryan Leonard is booked for the home team.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a second substitution, with Sam Baldock replacing Yakou Meite.
